idea: Inkcasa is a technology-driven personalized home design and decor marketplace for homeowners in India. The startup offers homeowners a variety of pre-designed looks for all rooms, kitchen, and storage areas for their homes and commercial space owners entirely customized solution. Homeowners can purchase these looks, which are designed by our experienced designers, and personalize them (by material, color, style). In a few weeks, they can get the exact personalized interior design installed within a pre-defined timeframe end-to-end.
name: INKSTUDIO INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Can you imagine a system which not only hears to your tasks ( like traditional To-Do list apps) but keeps a close watch on you, takes follow ups, motivates you & pushes you to accomplish your tasks?!

tASKbuddy is a platform to boost your productivity by connecting you to like minded people, competing with friends, engaging in discussion forums, getting incentivized for finishing your tasks and rewards from brands.

There's someone out there to help you with your To-Do! :)
name: tASKbuddy

idea:
Website- EUME

EUME launched the World's first built-In massaging backpack in August 2018, and the technology is patent approved in USA, India, and PCT Filed Worldwide. 

We are a 100% Make-in-India product, and have exported to over 7 countries till date, including USA, UK, Russia, Middle Eastern Countries, Kenya, Australia and New Zealand. 

We are now looking to focus on expansion in India, especially in the corporate sector, and the e-commerce space, with these backpacks.

We feel that these backpacks are also good for the army and first-line-of-defence, and can be pushed in that sector. 

Recently, Mr. Akshay Kumar had donated these backpacks to the Mumbai Police Force too.
name: EUME

idea: Pykih is an information design studio based out of Delhi. We have worked with 90+ brands across 7 countries. Since 2017, we have started focusing on journalism and civic media. Most of our work has been focused on how can we help independent media build digital products that can help communicate evidence and news in a structured fashion. Clients include Washington DC based International Center for Journalists, UNDP India, Oxfam India, CEEW, etc. Our founder Ritvvij Parrikh (who has now moved as an advisor) was a Knight Fellow with ICFJ for over 3.5 years and has consulted with multiple news companies in India. In another company that Ritvvij co-founded (and eventually quit), Ritvvij has implemented multiple media research projects. One of them was WhatsApp commissioned project where the team implemented a nation-wide verification tipline for India General Elections - https://humane.club/sites/ and https://pykih.com/
name: Pykih

idea: We are Web/App developers is creative and knowledgeable to accomplish your individual demands as well as your business needs. Our experience and past work are the showcase of our brilliance in applications development.
name: SoftCoFrndss

idea:
Intract is a startup with only one mission: "Improving our India's education system with technology."


We provide apps & ERP systems to schools, colleges and coaching classes to communicate better, automate tasks and manage their institutions efficiently. 


We have two products: 

1. App: 'Intract For Institutes' (Play Store/App Store/Web) is a tool we made for schools and colleges to use as a communication bridge between teachers and parents of the students. The institutions can assign homework, post a notice/alert, give reminders for fee payments, take attendance, and get a lot of things done with our 20+ features app. We started in the pandemic to help schools operate online. We now have 14,000 students using our app throughout India.

2. ERP: (Web): IntractERP is a management software for schools & colleges. We provide tools like Admissions Management, Fees Management, Student Management, Staff & Payroll Management & other 5+ modules for school & college admin staff to manage their institutions better and more efficiently. 


We started in 2020 and are one of the fastest growing edu-tech startups in India focused on bettering India's Education System with the help of technology.
name: Intract Technologies
